title: Privacy policy
content:
To use this website, software and Bitconf products and services (Products) you may be required to register or provide personal data. Registration may be required to access some Product functionality, communication or participation in marketing activity. This Privacy Policy contains details on how this personal data is used. Read the Policy carefully and ask questions if you need.

This Privacy Policy regulates relationships between Bitconf and any individual or corporation (User) on processing personal data, including collection, processing, keeping and safety. This Policy covers all the data acquired by Bitconf or its affiliated bodies, or bodies performing on its behalf may acquire during the usage of its Products. 

Please note: by using Bitconf Products you express your acceptance and agreeing to become bound by the terms of this Policy regarding your personal data. If you do not unconditionally accept all the terms of this Policy, you have no right to use Products and must delete all Products components from your computer. 

Information Collection And Use 

While using our Products, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information (Personal Data) that can be used to contact or identify you. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to your name, email, phone number. 

Log Data 

Like many site operators, we collect information that your browser sends whenever you use Products ("Log Data"). This Log Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol ("IP") address, browser type, browser version, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on using Products and other statistics. In addition, we may use third party services that collect, monitor and analyze this.

Communications 

We may use your Personal Data to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information. 

Cookies 

Cookies are files with small amount of data, which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a web site and stored on your computer's hard drive. Like many sites, we use "cookies" to collect information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use Products. 

Data Retention 

How long we retain your Personal Data depends on the type of data and the purpose for which we process the data. We will retain your Personal Data for the period necessary to fulfil the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

Security 

The security of your Personal Data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. 

Changes To This Privacy Policy 

This Privacy Policy is effective as of May, 1, 2020 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future, which will be in effect immediately after being posted on this page. We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time and you should check this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the Products after we post any modifications to the Privacy Policy on this page will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Privacy Policy. If we make any changes to this Privacy Policy, we will not notify you. 

Contact Us 

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please email to support@bitconf.online
